Trader-Price:
{{Infobox musical artist | name = Trader-Price | image = | caption = | image_size = | alias = | origin = [[Burns Flat, Oklahoma]] | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | years_active = 1976-2016 | label = [[Universal Records (1988)|Universal]], [[Capitol Records|Capitol]] | associated_acts = | website = | past_members = Dan Trader-Price
Chris Trader-Price
Erick Trader-Price
Don Bell }} '''Trader-Price''' is an American [[country music]] group from [[Burns Flat, Oklahoma]] composed of brothers Dan, Chris and Erick Trader-Price and Don Bell. In 1989, Trader-Price charted two singles on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs|Hot Country Singles & Tracks]] chart.{{cite book|last=Whitburn|first=Joel|title=Hot Country Songs 1944 to 2005|publisher=Record Research, Inc|page=384|year=2005|isbn=0-89820-165-9}} Two of their singles also charted on the ''[[RPM (magazine)|RPM]]'' Country Tracks chart in Canada in 1990.{{cite web|url=http://www.collectionscanada.gc.ca/rpm/028020-119.01-e.php?brws_s=1&file_num=nlc008388.6650&type=1&interval=24&PHPSESSID=03s3qbliiiil0eaqmeqcl8d406|title=RPM Country Tracks for February 10, 1990|work=[[RPM (magazine)|RPM]]|accessdate=17 December 2010}}{{cite web|url=http://www.collectionscanada.gc.ca/rpm/028020-119.01-e.php?brws_s=1&file_num=nlc008388.1274&type=1&interval=24&PHPSESSID=03s3qbliiiil0eaqmeqcl8d406|title=RPM Country Tracks for July 21, 1990|work=[[RPM (magazine)|RPM]]|accessdate=17 December 2010}} A music video was filmed for their single "Lately Rose". ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! style="width:10em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row"| ''Trader-Price'' | * Release date: March 27, 1990 * Label: [[Capitol Records]] |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:10em;"| Single ! colspan="2"| Peak chart
positions ! rowspan="2"| Album |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! width="45"| [[Hot Country Songs|US Country]] ! width="45"| [[RPM (magazine)|CAN Country]] |- | rowspan="2"| 1989 ! scope="row"| "[[Sad Eyes (Robert John song)|Sad Eyes]]" | 55 | — | align="left" rowspan="3"| ''Trader-Price'' |- ! scope="row"| "Lately Rose" | 64 | 80 |- | 1990 ! scope="row"| "Karma Road" | — | 73 |- | colspan="5" style="font-size:8pt"| "—" denotes releases that did not chart |- |} ===Music videos=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
